# üé≠ Character Appearance

> Kamiron is a small, wiry Aarakocra with sleek bronze feathers and fierce amber eyes. His plumage is streaked with dark umber and glints of gold, giving him the illusion of a polished imperial emblem. Perched atop a Roman standard, Kamiron curls his wings and lowers his head like a statue, passing as the golden eagle of conquest. His movements are silent and exact, trained through years of aerial meditation. Robes of bark-dyed leather and forest moss trail from his shoulders like ritual vestments. Beneath him, an unseen servant ‚Äî invisible but robed ‚Äî carries the standard forward, giving the illusion of a divine presence leading the legion.
